it.polimi.dima.mediatracker.controllers

Class ScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.dima.mediatracker.controllers.ScreenController

  • public class ScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the creation of intents (with appropriate parameters) for every "screen" of the application

      • getHomeIntent

        public static Intent getHomeIntent(Context context)
        Getter
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        Returns:
        intent to reach the home page (no parameters)

      • getSettingsIntent

        Getter
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        Returns:
        intent to reach the settings page (no parameters)

      • getCategoryFormIntent

        public static Intent getCategoryFormIntent(Context context,
                                           Category category)
        Getter
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        category - the category to update or null if new category
        Returns:
        intent to reach a category form

      • getCategoryPageIntent

        public static Intent getCategoryPageIntent(Context context,
                                           Category category,
                                           Subcategory subcategory)
        Getter
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        category - the category of the page
        subcategory - the subcategory of the page (if null it brings to the main category page)
        Returns:
        intent to reach a category page (e.g. tracked items list)

      • getMediaItemFormIntent

        public static Intent getMediaItemFormIntent(Context context,
                                            Category category,
                                            MediaItem mediaItem)
        Getter
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        category - the category of the media item
        mediaItem - the media item to edit or null if new media item
        Returns:
        intent to reach a media item form
